manual.description: The inputs available to the user upon selecting this flow from the SharePoint Library.

body.Subject: Supervisor Approval for your file is complete
body.Body: The assigned Supervisor Review has been completed and rejected for the file @{body('Get_file_properties')?['{Name}']}.

Append_to_allResponses_variable_1.description: Appends each responder's name, vote, response date, and comments to the allResponses variable

Apply_to_each.description: Loops every response through the Append action

body.Subject: Flow alert: A File is Locked for Editing
body.Body:
Your flow to request a supervisor review for @{body('Get_file_properties')?['{Name}']} is currently not succeeding likely because the file is locked for editing by someone.  

Please ensure that no one has the file open.

If you continue to receive this error, please contact the IT team to confirm the reason that the flow is failing.

body.Subject: Flow alert: A File is Locked for Editing
body.Body:
Your flow to request a supervisor review for @{body('Get_file_properties')?['{Name}']} is currently not succeeding likely because the file is locked for editing by someone.  

Please ensure that no one has the file open.

You will know your file has been closed when you receive an Approval or Rejection email, or when the flow times out after one day.

If you continue to receive this error, please contact the IT team to confirm the reason that the flow is failing.

Add_approvers_to_an_array_variable.description: Nested in an Apply to Each in case multiple approvers are selected

Update_file_properties.description: Adds the name(s) of the selected approver(s) to SharePoint so that they will see it is assigned to them under the "My Reviews" view

Initialize_updateMetadata1_variable.description: Initializing the variable that gets changed to "true" when the SharePoint Library item has been successfully updated.

Initialize_supervisorReviewers_array_var.description: Initializing a variable to store the names of supervisor reviewers, if there are more than one.

Initialize_supervisorComments_variable.description: Initializing a variable to store the responses of each supervisor, if there are more than one.

Initialize_allResponses_variable.description: Initializes a variable to store each of the individual responses, with the approver name, response, response date, and comments

definition.description: This flow will send an approval request to the supervisor for the selected file. The supervisor can view and approve the request in the Approvals Center. To run this flow, select a file and choose this flow from the Flow menu.
